name: Taasver
description:
Tasveer is a photography game,.

You embodies a photograph in the Rajasthan to frame the local wildlife in different situation.
There is for the moment only two map, Jaipur and Jodpur with different architecture.
You have different objectives, take a camel, five camel or a monkey dancing on a camel.
It's all about timing and angles, use perspective it's your ally.

The game was made in 5 days and it's still kind of a prototype, it miss a lot of missions an different place.
The game was made in collaboration with a team of game designer in india, Pune precisely.
It also miss a Galellery system but all the photo are stocked in folder names Screenshots in the assets folder so you can contemplate your photos.
It might have bug too and i'm really sorry if there is some.
The last part of the game was done in a very short time so it might lack of testing.

In the project you will find a Readme i hope you will understand and enjoy the game even it's incomplete !
